name: Red Chilli Powder
description: 100% pure red chilli powder made from carefully selected chillies, stone-ground to preserve natural heat, colour and aroma. No added colours, no fillers – just strong, vibrant lal mirch that brings authentic flavour to everyday sabzis, dals, curries and snacks.

name: Turmeric Powder
description: Pure turmeric (haldi) powder with a warm golden colour and earthy aroma, ground from quality turmeric fingers. Ideal for daily Indian cooking, tadka and milk, this haldi adds depth of flavour while providing natural curcumin benefits without any artificial colours or additives.

name: Coriander Powder
description: Fresh and aromatic coriander (dhaniya) powder made from premium seeds, slow-ground to keep natural oils intact. Adds a gentle, balanced flavour to curries, gravies, sabzis and snacks, and works beautifully with jeera and chilli for classic Indian tadka.

name: Jeeravan Masala
description: Special Mehta Masala Jeeravan mix inspired by Indori street food, crafted for poha, fruits, khichdi, raita and chaats. A secret blend of spices that gives the signature tangy-spicy Indore taste – no artificial colours, just pure flavour in every sprinkle.
